children.value: This new feature provides a real-time, most up-to-date exchange rate on any given token or currency from a reliable and trustworthy data source.
In version 0.40, rate oracle has been integrated with

<Callout
  type="note"
  body="You can see how the rate oracle works with a strategy on [cross exhange market making] and [arbitrage] strategy."
  link={["/strategies/cross-exchange-market-making/", "/strategies/arbitrage/"]}
/>
The source where you want to pull data from can either be Binance or Coingecko. Please take note that using Coingecko will have a 30-second delay due to their API rate limit.

<Prompt
  prompt="What source do you want rate oracle to pull data from? (binance, coingecko)"
  response=">>> "
/>
This is a token in which you can display other tokens' value. Set the
according to your preferred token value.

<Prompt
  prompt="What is your default display token? (e.g. USDT,USD,EUR)"
  response=">>> "
/>
The symbol for the global token.

<Prompt
  prompt="What is your default display token symbol? (e.g. $, €)"
  response=">>> "
/>

<Callout
  type="note"
  body="If you happen to `start` the bot and produce the error, `Oracle rate is not available`, or If the `rate_oracle_source` fails to show any price reference on your pair, you may change the `oracle_source` by running `config rate_oracle_source` and switch between Binance or Coingecko."
/>

command, set it manually in the
